title: Can't Start Games with Camera Unlocked
body:
Can someone please explain how. I am tired of pressing Y every time a match starts

It is really weird for me, some games I start with the camera unlocked but others I don't

replies.body:
There could be a corruption in your settings that's failing to properly save to our servers.  A reset may fix this up for you:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Dude it FREAKIN worked. Thank you SO much. I have had this problem since I joined league 4 years ago   (I actually thought you WERE supposed to start every game with the camera locked until my brother told me he didn't have that problem like a week ago).

There isn't any info online that is clear for this easy fix, thank you sincerely
Wooo, glad to hear everything's okay now!  Sorry you've been dealing with it for so long, but I'll take note of that feedback!

no worries.
